todo.title: Portugal
todo.description: Embark on a journey through Portugal, where the charming streets of Lisbon captivate you, the golden beaches of the Algarve await, and Portuguese cuisine delights with authentic flavors. Explore castles in Sintra and create unforgettable memories in this destination full of history and beauty. Portugal invites you to experience something truly unique!

done.title: Brasil
done.description: Vibrant journey through Brazil, where the lively streets of Rio de Janeiro beckon, the pristine beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema invite relaxation, and the sizzling flavors of Brazilian cuisine tantalize your taste buds. Explore the lush Amazon rainforest or the awe-inspiring Iguazu Falls, creating unforgettable moments in this vast and diverse country. Brazil invites you to immerse yourself in its dynamic culture and natural wonders, promising an extraordinary adventure!
